name: NaN (Gnarwhal)
description:
This game is not a number.  It's also not a game really. So...whatever.

I forgot the jam was this weekend. As such I was not ready at all, so I used this opportunity to learn amethyst, the rust based game engine.

Controls

A/D  /  Left Joystick -> Lateral Movement
W / Controller A Button -> Full Hop
Space / Controller X Button -> Short Hop
